settings.question: Asian Grocery & Snack Food
settings.answer_body1: One of our curated categories is our Asian grocery store section. We stock a vast selection of specialty products that you won't find in typical supermarket shelves including healthier Chinese, Korean and Japanese Groceries and snacks. Our online selection is available to Canada and worldwide.

settings.question: Well Well Well is the best place online to buy Asian snacks
settings.answer_body1: At Well Well Well Nutrition Centre, we want to make sure Asian food lovers can buy healthier Asian snacks and groceries online in Canada and worldwide at one convenient spot. We even boast varied selections of unique goods like dried seaweed to fermented gluten free pastes for sauces. We have the healthiest Korean and Chinese grocery and snacks online.

settings.question: What are some of the most popular Asian snacks that I can buy?
settings.answer_body1: Some of the most popular Asian food and snacks in Canada include gluten free rice noodles and various sauces. At Well Well Well Nutrition you have a good selection of Chinese, Japanese, Korean snacks and food for purchase online in Canada and worldwide. If you are looking to buy Asian snacks online we are your preferred Asian grocery store.

settings.question: What are some of the most purchased Asian grocery items?
settings.answer_body1: Some of the most purchased Asian snacks and groceries online in Canada are Korean and Japanese groceries. Both Korean and Japanese cuisine offer gluten free noodles that are based on yams and rice. These products are also great Chinese food replacements. Online in Canada and worldwide we are your trusted retailer. Rather than your next Asian take out delivery order, get an Asian grocery delivery for a healthier meal.

settings.question: Testing
settings.answer_body1:
Pre & post natal vitamins & supplements which make up a large part
of our natural pregnancy products  selection, can be essential in
helping mother and child in general wellbeing and preventing vitamin
deficiencies. Commonly recommended best products for pregnancy are the
combination of folic acid and vitamin B1, that work synergistically for
fetal development such as cell division and the formation of the myelin
sheath or nerve covering. Another benefit is that they also prevent the
buildup of homocysteine, a toxic by-product of protein metabolism that
has been associated with birth defects.

Iron
is also another important factor in a baby’s development. Many of the
best natural prenatal vitamins, multivitamins & supplements also
contain iron which helps to increase blood production for the baby. But
it is important to consult a healthcare practitioner when dealing with
all natural pregnancy products. We carry a number of different mom and
baby care products such as lactation teas for healthy milk production
for the mother. The benefits are numerous when it comes to mom and baby
care products at Well Well Well. Research has shown from a 1998 study,
that a child’s risk for developing a brain tumour decreased in
connection to the number of trimesters the mother took Prenatal
multivitamin supplements during pregnancy. At Well Well Well, we also
carry a number of quality baby and kids supplements to help with your
child’s development and health.

Another
very important aspect for new mothers is natural skin care during
pregnancy. Making sure that skin care products are clean and non-toxic
for the mother is imperative in maintaining skin health during
pregnancy.

settings.question: What are the best skincare products for mothers and children?
settings.answer_body1:
Babies
and children who have a parent or sibling with food allergies are at a
higher risk of developing allergies, our non toxic baby health care
products can help. Common reactions to foods range from diarrhea,
vomiting, coughing, hives, or rashes. These reactions and/or symptoms
are indicators that your baby’s or child’s digestive system has not
reached a point of full growth to digest the food in question or that
they are simply sensitive to the food. Regardless of the reason, it is
best to avoid any food that causes the above mentioned symptoms or
reactions. It is commonly recommended to cease feeding your child these
foods as continuing to do so can result in allergies.

When
considering a baby’s health, it is important to also consider the
baby’s skin health in conjunction with their digestive system. At Well
Well Well, we carry the safest and best natural baby skin care products
that are non toxic for skin care. These all natural baby products also
help with sensitive skin and baby skin. and digestive health. Studies
have shown that supplementing with probiotics, also known as beneficial
bacteria such as lactobacillus, during pregnancy and breastfeeding may
reduce the risk of babies and children developing sensitive skin issues
such as eczema. Our staff at Well Well Well will help you find the best
organic baby care products and probiotics designed for infants and
children to assist with their developing digestive systems.

settings.question: What is considered Asian food?
settings.answer_body1: As the world's most populous continent, Asian cuisine is highly diverse not only from a geographical standpoint, but also because of the ingredients the continent offers. Around the world, Thai, Japanese, Chinese, Middle Eastern and Central Asian foods are rich with unique flavours. Some staple foods include noodles, rice, beans and various types of fermented dishes boasting many types of spices and sauces.

settings.question: Can I visit the Asian grocery at Well Well Well?
settings.answer_body1: You're more than welcome to visit the Well Well Well Nutrition Centre in St. Catharines, where our food specialists and product specialists will gladly provide assistance. We're open 7 days a week, and we stock a variety of Asian food.

settings.question: What are the top selling Asian food items in Canada?
settings.answer_body1: Some of the top-selling Asian food in Canada include rice, noodles and various fermented products like kimchi and miso. At Well Well Well Nutrition Centre, we stock all your favourites plus a wide variety of rare and specialty Asian food grocery items that you'll struggle to find elsewhere, especially at such a high-value price!

settings.question: What should I buy at an Asian grocery store?
settings.answer_body1:
If you're looking for healthy and tasty Asian grocery items, you might want to buy spices and sauces that go great with meat, seafood, and vegetable dishes. But we also recommend taking a look at some of the more exclusive items you can use to make exquisite and authentic meals. 

Also, you can buy healthier asian snacks at our online store in Canada. If you are looking for something specific in our Asian food store, we encourage you to email our product specialists
